ctu_text: \n\n", "briefDescription": "The scheme \"Gomant Vibhushan Award\" has been designed in order to honour and recognize the Goan renowned personalities who have contributed to the distinguished and extraordinary achievements/ services in any field of activities/disciplines such as art & culture, literature & education, sports, etc. ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \"Gomant Vibhushan Award\" has been designed by the Directorate of Art and Culture, Government of Goa in order to honour and recognize the Goan renowned personalities who have contributed to the distinguished and extraordinary achievements/ services in any field of activities/disciplines such as art & culture, literature & education, sports, medicine, social work, civil services, public affairs, trade, science & engineering, industry, economics, philosophy, politics, or any other field at national & international level. The Gomant Vibhushan Award shall be given once in two years. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Objectives", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "To honour the Goan-origin personalities who have done admirable & exceptional work in their field.
